title: [Medicine] A study facilitated by the Michael J. Fox Foundation found that people with Parkinson's disease "reported using more CBD products, via oral administration, with mild subjective benefits primarily for sleep, pain, and mood."

[Epidemiology] Large RCT (n=21,315) fails to find significant effect of vitamin D supplementation on all-cause mortality; HR 1.04 [95% CI 0.93–1.18]. Excluding the first 2 years of follow-up, researchers also found a higher hazard of cancer mortality among the vitamin D group; HR 1.24 [95% CI 1.01–1.54].
